ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: Learned about the history of early socialism and how early thinkers conceptualized the relationship between socialism and democracy. Developed skills in analyzing difficult theoretical texts and putting them in conversation with one another
I learned the basis of socialism and democracy through several very interesting readings.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Strengths: very comprehensive, well-organized, good feedback, Professor was there to help whenever I needed it

Strength: fantastic professor, great at keeping the class engaged on the subject matter 
Weakness: a LOT of reading. So much so that its not always possible to cover everything in class

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Definitely recommend this course, professor Rubinelli is fantastic
Absolutely! The teacher was very insightful during discussions and the readings were exemplary.
